    1. modifyPitch(int)

Interface PitchStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
HigherPitchStrategy, LowerPitchStrategy
public interface PitchStrategy
Strategy interface for modifying the pitch of MIDI notes. Part of the Strategy design pattern implementation for pitch modification. Concrete implementations define specific ways to transform MIDI note numbers.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    modifyPitch(int note)
    Modifies the pitch of a MIDI note according to the strategy.

  • Method Details

    • modifyPitch

      int modifyPitch(int note)
      Modifies the pitch of a MIDI note according to the strategy.
      Parameters:
      note - The original MIDI note number (0-127)
      Returns:
      The modified MIDI note number (0-127)
